queries.queryString:
_index=sumologic_volume _sourcecategory=sourcecategory_and_tier_volume

// Excluding current day (incomplete data set)
| formatdate(now(), "YYYY-MM-dd") as currenDay
| formatdate(_messageTime, "YYYY-MM-dd") as eventDay
| where eventDay != currenDay

// Excluding first day in the query (incomplete data set)
| formatdate(queryStartTime(), "YYYY-MM-dd") as queryStartDay
| where eventDay != queryStartDay

// Parsing events 
| parse regex "\{\"field\":\"(?<sourcecategory>[^\"]*)\",\"dataTier\":\"(?<tier>[^\"]*)\",\"sizeInBytes\":(?<bytes>\d*),\"count\":(?<events>\d*)}" multi nodrop
| where tier = "CSE"

// Discarding internal values
| where !(sourcecategory matches "*_volume")

// Aggregating per day - sum of bytes as GBytes per data tier
| timeslice 1d
| sum(bytes) as bytes by _timeslice, tier
| bytes/1Gi as GBytes

// Calculating credit cost per Gbyte per data tier
| {{INGEST_CSE}} as credit_cost

// Calculating the sum of credits used per day
| (GBytes*credit_cost) as credits
| sum(credits) as credits by _timeslice
| max(credits) as credits
| round(credits) as credits

_index=sumologic_volume _sourcecategory=sourcecategory_and_tier_volume

// Excluding current day (incomplete data set)
| formatdate(now(), "YYYY-MM-dd") as currenDay
| formatdate(_messageTime, "YYYY-MM-dd") as eventDay
| where eventDay != currenDay

// Excluding first day in the query (incomplete data set)
| formatdate(queryStartTime(), "YYYY-MM-dd") as queryStartDay
| where eventDay != queryStartDay

// Parsing events 
| parse regex "\{\"field\":\"(?<sourcecategory>[^\"]*)\",\"dataTier\":\"(?<tier>[^\"]*)\",\"sizeInBytes\":(?<bytes>\d*),\"count\":(?<events>\d*)}" multi nodrop
| where tier = "CSE"

// Discarding internal values
| where !(sourcecategory matches "*_volume")

// Aggregating per day - sum of bytes as GBytes per data tier
| timeslice 1d
| sum(bytes) as bytes by _timeslice, tier
| bytes/1Gi as GBytes

// Calculating credit cost per Gbyte per data tier
| {{INGEST_CSE}} as credit_cost

// Calculating the sum of credits used per day
| (GBytes*credit_cost) as credits
| sum(credits) as credits by _timeslice
| order by _timeslice

// Prediction
| predict credits by 1d forecast=30
| credits_predicted as predicted


| fields _timeslice, predicted

_index=sumologic_volume _sourcecategory=sourcecategory_and_tier_volume

// Excluding current day (incomplete data set)
| formatdate(now(), "YYYY-MM-dd") as currenDay
| formatdate(_messageTime, "YYYY-MM-dd") as eventDay
| where eventDay != currenDay

// Excluding first day in the query (incomplete data set)
| formatdate(queryStartTime(), "YYYY-MM-dd") as queryStartDay
| where eventDay != queryStartDay

// Parsing events 
| parse regex "\{\"field\":\"(?<sourcecategory>[^\"]*)\",\"dataTier\":\"(?<tier>[^\"]*)\",\"sizeInBytes\":(?<bytes>\d*),\"count\":(?<events>\d*)}" multi nodrop
| where tier = "CSE"

// Discarding internal values
| where !(sourcecategory matches "*_volume")

// Aggregating per day - sum of bytes as GBytes per data tier
| timeslice 1d
| sum(bytes) as bytes by _timeslice, tier
| bytes/1Gi as GBytes

// Calculating credit cost per Gbyte per data tier
| {{INGEST_CSE}} as credit_cost

// Calculating the sum of credits used per day
| (GBytes*credit_cost) as credits
| sum(credits) as credits by _timeslice
| avg(credits) as credits
| round(credits) as credits

_index=sumologic_volume _sourcecategory={{INGEST_DIMENSION}}_and_tier_volume

| parse regex "\{\"field\":\"(?<{{INGEST_DIMENSION}}>[^\"]*)\",\"dataTier\":\"(?<tier>[^\"]*)\",\"sizeInBytes\":(?<bytes>\d*),\"count\":(?<events>\d*)}" multi nodrop
| where tier = "CSE"

| sum(bytes) as bytes by {{INGEST_DIMENSION}}
| bytes/1Gi as GBytes

| {{INGEST_CSE}} as credit_cost

| round(GBytes*credit_cost) as credits
| round(GBytes,1) as GBytes

| fields -bytes, credit_cost

| order by credits desc

_index=sumologic_volume _sourcecategory=sourcecategory_metrics_volume

// Excluding current day (incomplete data set)
| formatdate(now(), "YYYY-MM-dd") as currenDay
| formatdate(_messageTime, "YYYY-MM-dd") as eventDay
| where eventDay != currenDay

// Excluding first day in the query (incomplete data set)
| formatdate(queryStartTime(), "YYYY-MM-dd") as queryStartDay
| where eventDay != queryStartDay

// Parsing events 
| parse regex "\"(?<sourcecategory>[^\"]*)\":\{\"dataPoints\":(?<datapoints>\d+)\}" multi nodrop

// Aggregating per day - sum of DPM
| timeslice 1d
| sum(datapoints) as datapoints by _timeslice
| datapoints / 24 / 60 / 1000 as DPM

// Calculating credit cost per DPM
| {{INGEST_METRICS}} as credit_cost

// Calculating the sum of credits used per day
| (DPM*credit_cost) as credits
| sum(credits) as credits by _timeslice
| avg(credits) as credits
| round(credits) as credits

_index=sumologic_volume _sourcecategory=sourcecategory_metrics_volume

// Excluding current day (incomplete data set)
| formatdate(now(), "YYYY-MM-dd") as currenDay
| formatdate(_messageTime, "YYYY-MM-dd") as eventDay
| where eventDay != currenDay

// Excluding first day in the query (incomplete data set)
| formatdate(queryStartTime(), "YYYY-MM-dd") as queryStartDay
| where eventDay != queryStartDay

// Parsing events 
| parse regex "\"(?<sourcecategory>[^\"]*)\":\{\"dataPoints\":(?<datapoints>\d+)\}" multi nodrop

// Aggregating per day - sum of DPM
| timeslice 1d
| sum(datapoints) as datapoints by _timeslice
| datapoints / 24 / 60 / 1000 as DPM

// Calculating credit cost per DPM
| {{INGEST_METRICS}} as credit_cost

// Calculating the sum of credits used per day
| (DPM*credit_cost) as credits
| sum(credits) as credits by _timeslice
| max(credits) as credits
| round(credits) as credits

_index=sumologic_volume _sourcecategory=sourcecategory_metrics_volume

// Excluding current day (incomplete data set)
| formatdate(now(), "YYYY-MM-dd") as currenDay
| formatdate(_messageTime, "YYYY-MM-dd") as eventDay
| where eventDay != currenDay

// Excluding first day in the query (incomplete data set)
| formatdate(queryStartTime(), "YYYY-MM-dd") as queryStartDay
| where eventDay != queryStartDay

// Parsing events 
| parse regex "\"(?<sourcecategory>[^\"]*)\":\{\"dataPoints\":(?<datapoints>\d+)\}" multi nodrop

// Aggregating per day - sum of DPM
| timeslice 1d
| sum(datapoints) as datapoints by _timeslice
| datapoints / 24 / 60 / 1000 as DPM

// Calculating credit cost per DPM
| {{INGEST_METRICS}} as credit_cost

// Calculating the sum of credits used per day
| (DPM*credit_cost) as credits
| sum(credits) as credits by _timeslice
| order by _timeslice

// Prediction
| predict credits by 1d forecast=30
| credits_predicted as predicted


| fields _timeslice, predicted

_index=sumologic_volume _sourcecategory={{INGEST_DIMENSION}}_metrics_volume


| parse regex "\"(?<{{INGEST_DIMENSION}}>[^\"]*)\":\{\"dataPoints\":(?<datapoints>\d+)\}" multi nodrop

| timeslice 1d
| sum(datapoints) as datapoints by _timeslice, {{INGEST_DIMENSION}}
| datapoints / 24 / 60 / 1000 as DPM

| sum(DPM) as DPM by {{INGEST_DIMENSION}}

| {{INGEST_METRICS}} as credit_cost

| round(DPM*credit_cost) as credits
| round(DPM,1) as DPM

| fields -credit_cost

| order by credits desc

_index=sumologic_volume _sourcecategory=sourcecategory_tracing_volume

// Excluding current day (incomplete data set)
| formatdate(now(), "YYYY-MM-dd") as currenDay
| formatdate(_messageTime, "YYYY-MM-dd") as eventDay
| where eventDay != currenDay

// Excluding first day in the query (incomplete data set)
| formatdate(queryStartTime(), "YYYY-MM-dd") as queryStartDay
| where eventDay != queryStartDay

// Parsing events 
| parse regex "\"(?<sourcecategory>[^\"]*)\":\{\"billedBytes\":(?<bytes>\d+)" multi nodrop

// Aggregating per day - sum of bytes
| timeslice 1d
| sum(bytes) as bytes by _timeslice

| bytes/1Gi as GBytes

// Calculating credit cost per bytes
| {{INGEST_TRACING}} as credit_cost

// Calculating the sum of credits used per day
| (GBytes*credit_cost) as credits
| sum(credits) as credits by _timeslice
| avg(credits) as credits
| round(credits) as credits

// Excluding current day (incomplete data set)

// Excluding first day in the query (incomplete data set)

| where eventDay != queryStartDay

// Parsing events 
| parse regex "\"(?<sourcecategory>[^\"]*)\":\{\"billedBytes\":(?<bytes>\d+)" multi nodrop

// Aggregating per day - sum of bytes
| timeslice 1d
| sum(bytes) as bytes by _timeslice

| bytes/1Gi as GBytes

_index=sumologic_volume _sourcecategory=sourcecategory_tracing_volume

// Excluding current day (incomplete data set)
| formatdate(now(), "YYYY-MM-dd") as currenDay
| formatdate(_messageTime, "YYYY-MM-dd") as eventDay
| where eventDay != currenDay

// Excluding first day in the query (incomplete data set)
| formatdate(queryStartTime(), "YYYY-MM-dd") as queryStartDay
| where eventDay != queryStartDay

// Parsing events 
| parse regex "\"(?<sourcecategory>[^\"]*)\":\{\"billedBytes\":(?<bytes>\d+)" multi nodrop

// Aggregating per day - sum of bytes
| timeslice 1d
| sum(bytes) as bytes by _timeslice

| bytes/1Gi as GBytes

// Calculating credit cost per bytes
| {{INGEST_TRACING}} as credit_cost

// Calculating the sum of credits used per day
| (GBytes*credit_cost) as credits
| sum(credits) as credits by _timeslice
| order by _timeslice

// Prediction
| predict credits by 1d forecast=30
| credits_predicted as predicted

_index=sumologic_volume _sourcecategory={{INGEST_DIMENSION}}_tracing_volume

// Parsing events 
| parse regex "\"(?<{{INGEST_DIMENSION}}>[^\"]*)\":\{\"billedBytes\":(?<bytes>\d+)" multi nodrop

| sum(bytes) as bytes by {{INGEST_DIMENSION}}
| bytes/1Gi as GBytes

| {{INGEST_TRACING}} as credit_cost

| round(GBytes*credit_cost) as credits
| round(GBytes,1) as GBytes

| fields -credit_cost, bytes

| order by credits desc

_index=sumologic_search_usage_per_query
  AND !(status_message = "Query canceled")
  AND !(user_name = security+sumosupport+*@sumologic.com) 

// Excluding current day (incomplete data set)
| formatdate(now(), "YYYY-MM-dd") as currenDay
| formatdate(_messageTime, "YYYY-MM-dd") as eventDay
| where eventDay != currenDay

// Excluding first day in the query (incomplete data set)
| formatdate(queryStartTime(), "YYYY-MM-dd") as queryStartDay
| where eventDay != queryStartDay

// selecting FLEX scans only
| json field=scanned_bytes_breakdown_by_metering_type "Flex" as bytes nodrop

// Aggregating per day - sum of bytes as GBytes per data tier
| timeslice 1d
| sum(bytes) as bytes by _timeslice
| bytes/1Ti as tbytes

| {{SCAN}} as credit_cost

// Calculating the sum of credits used per day
| tbytes * credit_cost as credits
| sum(credits) as credits by _timeslice
| avg(credits) as credits
| round(credits) as credits

_index=sumologic_search_usage_per_query
  AND !(status_message = "Query canceled")
  AND !(user_name = security+sumosupport+*@sumologic.com) 

// Excluding current day (incomplete data set)
| formatdate(now(), "YYYY-MM-dd") as currenDay
| formatdate(_messageTime, "YYYY-MM-dd") as eventDay
| where eventDay != currenDay

// Excluding first day in the query (incomplete data set)
| formatdate(queryStartTime(), "YYYY-MM-dd") as queryStartDay
| where eventDay != queryStartDay

// selecting FLEX scans only
| json field=scanned_bytes_breakdown_by_metering_type "Flex" as bytes nodrop

// Aggregating per day - sum of bytes as GBytes per data tier
| timeslice 1d
| sum(bytes) as bytes by _timeslice
| bytes/1Ti as tbytes

| {{SCAN}} as credit_cost

// Calculating the sum of credits used per day
| tbytes * credit_cost as credits
| sum(credits) as credits by _timeslice
| max(credits) as credits
| round(credits) as credits

_index=sumologic_search_usage_per_query
  AND !(status_message = "Query canceled")
  AND !(user_name = security+sumosupport+*@sumologic.com) 

// Excluding current day (incomplete data set)
| formatdate(now(), "YYYY-MM-dd") as currenDay
| formatdate(_messageTime, "YYYY-MM-dd") as eventDay
| where eventDay != currenDay

// Excluding first day in the query (incomplete data set)
| formatdate(queryStartTime(), "YYYY-MM-dd") as queryStartDay
| where eventDay != queryStartDay

// selecting FLEX scans only
| json field=scanned_bytes_breakdown_by_metering_type "Flex" as bytes nodrop

// Aggregating per day - sum of bytes as GBytes per data tier
| timeslice 1d
| sum(bytes) as bytes by _timeslice
| bytes/1Ti as tbytes

| {{SCAN}} as credit_cost

// Calculating the sum of credits used per day
| tbytes * credit_cost as credits
| sum(credits) as credits by _timeslice
| order by _timeslice

// Average credit consumption trend
| smooth credits as trend

| fields _timeslice, credits, trend

_index=sumologic_search_usage_per_query
  AND !(status_message = "Query canceled")
  AND !(user_name = security+sumosupport+*@sumologic.com) 

// Excluding current day (incomplete data set)
| formatdate(now(), "YYYY-MM-dd") as currenDay
| formatdate(_messageTime, "YYYY-MM-dd") as eventDay
| where eventDay != currenDay

// Excluding first day in the query (incomplete data set)
| formatdate(queryStartTime(), "YYYY-MM-dd") as queryStartDay
| where eventDay != queryStartDay

// selecting FLEX scans only
| json field=scanned_bytes_breakdown_by_metering_type "Flex" as bytes nodrop

// Aggregating per day - sum of bytes as GBytes per data tier
| timeslice 1d
| sum(bytes) as bytes by _timeslice
| bytes/1Ti as tbytes

| {{SCAN}} as credit_cost

// Calculating the sum of credits used per day
| tbytes * credit_cost as credits
| sum(credits) as credits by _timeslice
| order by _timeslice

// Prediction
| predict credits by 1d forecast=30
| credits_predicted as predicted


| fields _timeslice, predicted

_index=sumologic_search_usage_per_query
  AND !(status_message = "Query canceled")
  AND !(user_name = security+sumosupport+*@sumologic.com) 

| json field=scanned_bytes_breakdown_by_metering_type "Flex" as bytes nodrop

| sum(bytes) as bytes by {{SCAN_DIMENSION}}
| bytes/1Ti as TBytes

| {{SCAN}} as credit_cost

| round(TBytes*credit_cost) as credits
| round(TBytes,2) as TBytes

| fields -bytes, credit_cost

| order by credits desc
